name: Jump 'n' Hurt
description:
Game made by Eirik & Justus for Wowie Game Jam 3

Free game assets which we used from itch.io:
Treasure Chests (2D sprites):
https://seliel-the-shaper.itch.io/treasure-chests
Heros Determination (Music):
https://ansimuz.itch.io/heros-determination
PFantasy Set 1 (2D sprites):
https://szadiart.itch.io/platformer-fantasy-set1
Pixel Heart (2D sprites):
https://nicolemariet.itch.io/pixel-heart-animation-32x32-16x16-freebie
Player & Character (2D sprites):
https://szadiart.itch.io/animated-character-pack
Backgrounds (2D sprites):
https://trixelized.itch.io/starstring-fields
Sounds:
https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack
